PRICE REDUCTIONS!

Assorted T206’s available for sale.

Photos 3-8 show everything a bit closer up. 

John McGraw 
- Finger in air SC 150/25 - SOLD
- Red portrait Piedmont 350/25 - $230
- Glove at hip Sweet Caporal (paper loss on back) - SOLD

Hal Chase
- Black cap throwing SC 350/25 - SOLD
- Blue portrait SC 350/30 - SOLD

- Fielder Jones Piedmont 150/25 - $115
- Fred Clarke Piedmont 150/25 - $145
- Buck Herzog Piedmont 350/460/25 - SOLD
- Rebel Oakes Piedmont 350/25 - SOLD
- Red Dooin SC 150/30 - SOLD
- Miller Huggins SC 350/25 - SOLD
- Roger Bresnahan PSA 2 (MK) Piedmont 350/25 (WITH BACK STAMP) - $145

All prices include BMWT & assume no fees. If paying G&S, please add 3%. 

Not looking to trade at the moment. 

Any questions, let me know!
I’ll take Chase portrait and Oakes

[quote name="chrisn28" post=2190579]I’ll take Chase portrait and Oakes[/QUOTE]

All yours. I’ll PM my payment info
